name: First Person Hooper
description:
First Person Hooper is an arcade-style basketball game focused on the art of the jump shot. Featuring first-person shooter controls with a lock-on system similar to modern FPS games, players can easily shoot the ball using power and timing based on location on the court. Score with style while moving and get rewarded with a power-up by making shots that hit nothing but net. Get shots up in a relaxed island setting and customize the court to fit your mood. Includes score, time-attack, and free play modes.

GAME MODES
🔸 Arcade (Score Attack) - Score in a variety of ways within a chosen time limit to achieve the highest score possible
🔸 Spot Up (Time Attack) - Make shots from different spots on the court and record your fastest time
🔸 Zen (Free Play) - Relax and shoot at your leisure, perfect your jump shot, and view stats in realtime

FEATURES
🔸 Shot-power and timing mechanic that adjusts to your movement
🔸 Lock-on aiming system for quick & easy shot making
🔸 Many ways to score such as perfect releases, swishes, bankshots, fadeaways, and more
🔸 Additional skill level for hoopers that prefer manual control
🔸 Ball, court, hoop, and crosshair customization
🔸 Stat sheet and shot chart that keeps track of shot types & percentages
🔸 In-game secrets, bonuses, and special zones
🔸 Scoring multipliers up to 4x when making shots in a row
🔸 Ability to power-up your shot for a guaranteed make
🔸 Semi-realistic basketball physics
🔸 Plenty of options to customize the interface and game experience
🔸 Online leaderboards for Arcade and Spot Up modes
🔸 Lots of replayability to master the jump shot & beat your best times and high scores
🔸 Ultrawide monitor support and refresh rate options
🔸 Lo-fi instrumental hiphop soundtrack by hypoetical
